home.text: Do you need effective and good looking solutions for the frontend of your business? You're in the right place!

contact.other-contacts: You can also contact me from:

software-engineer.title: Marin Soluciones
description: Led the migration of Microsoft Access software from this startup to a more robust and secure tech stack.
Made an overall better UI/UX design using tools like Figma, adding new features that enhance the productivity of the users by a 30%
Enhanced the personalization, add more feedback in the form of notification, made the design fully responsive
Design the CI/CD pipeline using Github Actions, supervise the migration of the backend as well making it 70% more fast, and safer

frontend-developer.title: RWA Inc
description: Make the design for corporate tools using Figma in team, designing the UI flow, keeping a nice and simple UX
Take decision on regard of tech stack depending on the project, create the Frontend of the projects using (generally) technologies like React, NextJS, TailwindCSS, etc
Supervise the whole development process, making sure the code is scalable and met certain quality standards
Improvise the productivity by a 10% with respect to before
